Code preview of 用户角色表JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP

drop index IDX_MEM_GROUP on JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP;

drop index IDX_MEM_USER on JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP;

drop table if exists JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP */
/*==============================================================*/
create table JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP
(
DBID_ bigint not null,
DBVERSION_ integer not null,
USER_ bigint,
GROUP_ bigint,
NAME_ varchar(255),
INDEX FK_MEM_USER (USER_),
primary key (DBID_)
)
type=InnoDB;

alter table JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP comment '用户角色表
';

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: IDX_MEM_USER */
/*==============================================================*/
create index IDX_MEM_USER on JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP
(
USER_
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: IDX_MEM_GROUP */
/*==============================================================*/
create index IDX_MEM_GROUP on JBPM4_ID_MEMBERSHIP
(
GROUP_
);
